2025.title: Point in Time
2025.desc: A few tracks that are all themed around different feelings and brief experiences and special momements in my life which you can probably some what guess based on the track titles.

2025.title: Bleeding Prey
2025.desc: Sometimes words tend to take away something from a piece, so I'm not gonna say anything about this one.

2025.title: Peace of Mind
2025.desc: An album about never giving up. (Don't really have much to say about this one but it was a lot of fun making this collection of tracks.) The cover art was made by a very talented friend who wants to remain anonymous.

2025.title: Out of Touch
2025.desc: A very emotional piano piece with some minor editing. In this I reflected a lot about some darker chapters of my life and about where I am now.

2025.title: Abyssal Reverie (feat. Mazarine)
2025.desc: This is very different from my usual style. This is a dark ambient piece I made together with Mazarine, where we both only communicated about the genre and rough length and then both did our own thing and recoreded something. After that we just threw our recordings togehter and only lined up the beginnings and watched what crazy magic unfolded.

2025.title: Burnt and Buried
2025.desc: A piece about the feelings that I want to burn and bury.

2025.title: Quantum Branches
2025.desc: A piece that I just started making on a random friday night and that turned into one of my favorite works. This is also the first time I made a proper video for a music piece.

2025.title: Fallen Light
2025.desc: This track started more as an experiment with Karplus Strong (a method of synthesizing string like instruments) experimentation, and turned into a nice little dreamy track.

2025.title: Stuck between Worlds
2025.desc: This is again a rather personal work. This is a manifestation of my feelings during a time where I felt kind of mentally stuck.

2025.title: Maschinisierung
2025.desc: Made in one hour for a contest with friends, the theme was something industrial.

2025.title: Second Sky
2025.desc: Made in one hour for a contest with friends, we had no theme for this one. But I really like how this one turned out.

2025.title: A path to NonE
2025.desc: This track acts as a reflection of the previous year (2024) and what I feel towards the new year (2025).

2024.title: Moratorium
2024.desc: This collection of tracks is the result of a time period where I felt a bit worse then usual mentally speaking towards the end of 2024.

2024.title: Lost in my World
2024.desc: The exact reasons behind this piece are a bit too personal for me to share, but it's probably one of my most emotional pieces that I hold very dear.

2024.title: Out on the Field
2024.desc: I made this track literally sitting out on a field taking in the atmosphere and manifesting it into this track.

2024.title: Murky Waters (feat. Jimbo)
2024.desc: My first ever collab with a friend, she played the electric guitar in this track. It was a lot of fun to make this one.

2024.title: Ripples of the night
2024.desc: This track was inspired by a night drive.

2024.title: mors et spes
2024.desc: In this work I contemplated with my feelings over death and the cycle of life in general in a kind of philosophical manner. Also spend an unreasonable amount of time with sound design on these tracks.

2024.title: Better things to come
2024.desc: This track is dedicated to a friend who went through some rough emotional trouble.

2024.title: Unheilbare Wunden
2024.desc: I made this track at 3 am in Vienna during a trip, because the feelings I had for a person (the same one "Rainy Ways" is related to) troubled me (although I processed most of my feelings for that person already) and I needed to get that of my chest. It helped me to completly come to terms with the feelings I had for that person and those feelings never troubled me again.

2024.title: Untrodden Shores
2024.desc: I took a trip to a friend who lives a considerable amount far away from me and where he lives it's not far from the shore. I made the first track before the trip to capture my expectations and the second track after the trip to reflect on it.

2024.title: Rainy Ways
2024.desc: Things didn't work out with a person (same one from "Morphing Shadows") I had feelings for, so this is me reflecting and processing on what happened and dealing with the feelings I had for the person.

2024.title: Shift
2024.desc: Made as a mock up for a sound track of a hypothetical experimental movie for an art project. Quite fun sound stuff. (This description might be a bit confusing in hindsight...)

2024.title: Morphing Shadows
2024.desc: The uncertainty regarding a person I had feelings for got to me, because the person knew that I had feelings for them, but they were unsure and said they need more time to make up their mind which is totally fine. But eventually it tore me apart so I made this track to cope with it.

2024.title: Decay Prevails
2024.desc: A piece inspired by lost places.

2024.title: Fight for Faith
2024.desc: My first proper work I'm proud of. I changed a lot of my views on the world during that time and that is what also went into this.

2024.title: Mental Harbour
2024.desc: A techno-esc track entirely made only with two hardware synths and layered recordings.

2024.title: Memory Override
2024.desc: A track only made with layered recordings of one hardware synth.

2022.title: State of Mind
2022.desc: My first ever album, this was made during my depressive episode that I probably wouldn't have overcome without making music and that is the sole reason why I discovered making music for me. And I'm also insanely glad for all the people that were there for me during that time.
